vocabinfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Kittim of the Greeks, first mentioned at Gen.10.4; descended from Javan (H3120); along with Elishah (H0473), Tarshish (H8659) and Dodanim (H1721)
§ Chittim or Kittim = "bruisers"
1) a general term for all islanders of the Mediterranean Sea
2) the descendants of Javan, the son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: descendientes de Javán, hijo de Jafet; = ¿Grecia?
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基提 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 「壯漢」
1) 稱呼地中海所有海島居民的一般用語
2) 雅完的兒子, 雅完是雅弗的兒子, 挪亞的孫子 ( 創 10:1)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基提 这个形容词在原文的意思是 「壮汉」
1) 称呼地中海所有海岛居民的一般用语
2) 雅完的儿子, 雅完是雅弗的儿子, 挪亚的孙子 ( 创 10:1)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Chittim or Kittim = "bruisers"
This name is used for:
1) a general term for all islanders of the Mediterranean Sea
2) the descendants of Javan, the son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
